name: Step (USC x Geidai Collaboration)
description:
Published in 2020, Step is a game that is part of the USCxGeidai Collaboration. You can play the  game  by downloading it here!

Step is an exploration of being a game designer from our perspective and experiences. The project is an experimental endeavor that brings cross-culture human experience to an interactive piece of our memories of what led us to become designers or what inspires us.
